item.description:
There are 15,000 life science leaders coming to town in June for the 2012 BIO International Convention - are you ready to network?

Join us at MassBio on Tuesday, May 1 at 5:30pm to enjoy a drink (or two), network, and discuss how to successfully network for employment.

For years now people have touted networking as the most effective means of finding a new job. However many people have a difficult time effectively navigating the waters that are employment networking. When Networking is Not Working is a brief presentation designed to quickly walk participants through the Dos and Don’ts of networking for employment.

You’ll gain insights from professional veterans from two biotech companies, a staffing agency and an Internet employment services firm and leave prepared to utilize networking opportunities at BIO in June. Join us!

Speakers include:


Pete Mello
Account Recruiting Manager, Aerotek


Nuno Goncalves
Manager, Scientific Staffing, Hire Minds


Darlene Cullen
Founder, Posting Wizard


Tracy Chandler
Associate Director, Global R&D Staffing, Vertex Pharmaceuticals


Kevin Coughlin
Associate Director, Staffing Operations, Vertex Pharmaceuticals
item.how_to_find_us: this is the new Mass Bio office location in Cambridge 300 Technology Square 8th floor
item.name: Real Networking Tips for Meeting the Global BIO Audience in June
